item.title: Personal blog & website with Hugo + PaperMod
item.description: Basics Introduction The whole website is developed based on Hugo and PaperMod theme. Deployment The website is deployed on GitHub Page. Create a new repository with the name yourname.github.io Initialize a git in public folder. 1 2 3 4 5 6 cd public git init git remote add origin [repository url] git add . git commit -m 'init' git push -f --set-upstream origin master hugo -F --cleanDestinationDir will generate the
